short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EE-CRS Provide Advance User friendlily features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily Upload Child Data in the CRS Site

- New Birth Entry Manually with Excel Sheet (Automatic) 
- Mantra Pending Applications (Birth Application Received) (Automatic) 
- Automatic Download Birth Certificate
- Some other features.

Email Address: eeprojectsee@gmail.com

TERMS OF SERVICE

1. EE-CRS Extension is not official India government 
         software, app and extensions.
2. If you use these software, then it will be your responsibility that 
          how you are using this software.
3. The main Purpose of these software is to make Data Entry easy, 
          but if you use these softwares to upload data unofficially, then it 
          will be your responsibility. EE-Projects will not have any 
          responsibility in this.
4. EE-Projects softwares do not access any type of user site data 
        while using these software.
